title: ennai AtkoL ayyE
sahitya:
ennai AtkoL ayyE cenni malai vaLLalE


anupallavi

  pannagat-tirumAlum paramEshap-perumAnum viNNaghat-turaivOrum viyakka sirippOnE


caraNam    ponnaDi undanadai endan idayam tannil padittup-paNindini tudittu vandiDuvEn
tannigharE illAmal anbarukku ellAm tunbamE aDukkAda inbam koDuppOnE
